review.title: Good hotel with interesting location
review.reviewText: A very large and comfortable room. Great view of the planes landing across the bay. Staff friendly and breakfast very good.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your great review!

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel's facilities and staff are excellent. We stay there for three nights and enjoyed very much our stay. The breakfast quality is above the average breakfast in other hotels.

review.title: excellent airport hotel
review.reviewText: The rooms and facilities are immaculate and luxurious and the service is extremely thoughtful. Just a great stay.

managementResponses.response: Chris thanks for the great review!

review.title: Great place, close to SF
review.reviewText: Really nice, definitely worth the money. Breakfast area was good, and they had the kinds of food that you would expect.
review.positiveRemarks: Room was clean and furnishings were new. The beds were a little soft, but that is a preference.
review.locationRemarks: It was right on the water, so there were a lot of Pokemon to catch.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Good location, free breakfast buffet, I have been there twice and liked my stay both times, will definitely go back

review.title: Clean, clear, and quite
review.reviewText: It's right beside the Waterfront, and you see the airport from the hotel, that's how close it is the distance between the two places. It's really clean and quiet.
review.locationRemarks: Take the hotel shuttle bus to go to the airport and transfer to Bart, so you can go to downtown San Francisco.

managementResponses.response: Thanks for the review!  We are reconsidering the microwave.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Ztayed one night while waiting for flight. Slose to airport, roomy and clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Really clean and close to restaraunts.
review.negativeRemarks: Strange breakfat set up. You havd to microwave everything.

managementResponses.response: We are so pleased to read your response!

review.title: Very happy
review.reviewText: I'm the pickiest person when it comes to staying at a hotel and I was very pleased with my stay at this hotel. I was happy with everything specially the staff. Vivian and her manager were awesome.

managementResponses.response: This is such a wonderful review to read and we appreciate it so very much.  Thank you.

review.title: Best hotel experience
review.reviewText: I travel more than 5 times a year and this was the best experience I've ever had with a hotel. It's not a 5 star hotel, but it was very clean and felt so cozy. We had a great view from our room. Breakfast was great. Free coffee and tea was available 24 hours a day. All the hygiene products in the room was organic. It was really the customer service (the manager and Vivian) who made this experience an amazing one. I definitely recommend it.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for giving us the information regarding your stay.  We will use it for staff training!

review.title: Very nice hotel near a few restaurants
review.reviewText: The lobby staff provided excellent service. I experienced a few problems (not major). There were 2 towel sets for a room of 4 people. The Housekeeper instructed ME to go to the front desk to get additional towels. The refrigerator took 24 hours to get cool. And, both rooms had 2 full size beds and I requested 2 queen size beds. On our last night there wasn't enough parking available.
review.positiveRemarks: The lobby staff, continental breakfast, the room decor
review.locationRemarks: the hotel was pretty local and near many necessary stores, i.e. gasoline, starbucks, eateries, and etc...

managementResponses.response: What a great review!  Thank you.

review.title: Great Choice Near SFO
review.reviewText: The owners and staff of this property clearly take great pride in their work and facility.  The room was spotless, as was the rest of the building.  The check in and check out staff were extremely friendly and comfortable to talk to.  It is not the low price leader by any means, and they don't have dining options on premises, but I'd highly recommend it.  Especially if you have an early flight out in the morning.  The airport shuttle starts at 4 a.m. and pretty much runs every 30 min. after that.

managementResponses.response: Nicole, thank you for your kind review. We will do a better job to notify guest about our power saving efforts by turning the refrigerators off after every stay.

review.title: Great hotel next to SFO airport
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel because the rate was competitive and the reviews were good. I was thrilled with this place. Very comfortable, clean and staff was friendly and attentive. I would stay here again happily.
review.negativeRemarks: Fridge could have been cold (not on 0/1) when we entered the room. We did not notice the fridge was not cold so only in the morning did we notice.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your kind response! Come back again soon!!

review.title: Excellent airport hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is really close to the airport but doesn't feel like an airport hotel. Staff were super friendly, room was spacious and clean and it was so lovely being able to walk outside and get some fresh air and watch the planes coming in to land. 100% recommend.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast gets a little crowded, a larger seating area would probably help
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport and BART station

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your kind review!

review.reviewText: No hassle hotel. Good experience. Easy access from the airport.

photos.caption: Just some of things in the breakfast menu

review.title: The bay view and brekfast
review.reviewText: Get the bay view on an upper floor..Hotel can be a bit noisy for light sleeper kids running but the room is comfy and spacious. The breakfast was better than expected eggs and bacon microwaved but behind the scenes most hotels rehear, hello homemade waffles and fruit all you can eat- the breakfast carried me through many early morning mid afternoon adventures in San Fran.

review.title: Very good hotel.  Many positives, few improvements
review.reviewText:
Spent three nights at the hotel and overall our stay at Bay Landing Hotel was pleasing.   Many positives such as free parking, clean rooms, quiet--albeit it was near the airport, our room #327 had a wonderful view of the bay and we could watch the jets take off and land, excellent paved walking/jogging path that goes up and down the bay.  

Free breakfast, but some breakfast items one needed to heated or reheated with the microwave as they were preprocessed frozen items ie bacon, sausage patty, omelets, ham, & a hash-brown potato wedge.   They did have three waffle irons for fresh made waffles.  Plenty of sliced and diced fruit and hot oatmeal.  Four different juice options and hot coffee. Their breakfast is nowhere as good as one's done by Embassy Suites, but it wasn't horrible either.   I just stayed away from the items one needed to zap in the microwave.    The breakfast dinning area is also small and congested.  Overall their breakfast was OK, but that is a good thing as I didn't overeat.    

Our room was extremely clean and spacious.  Beds were a bit small but comfortable.  They could have placed another bed or sofa couch in there to occupy the open "dead" space as the room had too much un-utilized space.  I recommend that they replace the their double sized beds with queens or king sized ones.  To be fair, they may have had rooms with double queens, but this room was the only one available for us when we booked.  

Bottom line---We would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Very good hotel near the airport with many good restaurants close by in Burlingame.
review.negativeRemarks: Highly unlikely-- but copy what Embassy Suites does for their breakfast.   Replace all smaller double mattresses with queens.
review.locationRemarks: Many dinning options close by.  We found an awesome place for meals call Urban Bistro.  Excellent food and they are fast & reasonably priced.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for letting us know about the wifi experience.

review.title: Don't expect Wifi to work
review.reviewText: Wifi system outdated. Unusable most of the time in the evening.

managementResponses.response: Mitch  thank you for your comments.

review.reviewText:
Check in was a bit strange. Gave me the key card to the room, then after I wandered away from the front desk, they asked me to return to reception, then after some deliberation gave me the same room. 

The rooms are fine, and tea and coffee is on offer all day in the lobby, but staying in the room directly across from the elevator is almost guaranteed to rob a light sleeper of sleep. 

Perhaps better to pay a bit more and book a bay view room. Or book a different hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff, room, tea and coffee on offer all day, shuttle service
review.negativeRemarks: Noise at night from the elevator next to the linen room.
review.locationRemarks: Close to SFO, and a couple of restaurants and bars nearby.

review.title: I was really impressed with this hotel!
review.reviewText:
Very nice rooms and facilities. The only down side is no on site restaurant. However, there are several close by and a bunch just on the other side of the freeway in Milbragh.

Close to the airport, but very quiet! Free parking and good Wi-Fi!

managementResponses.response: Mad Dog!  We surely appreciate your kind words.

review.title: Very good hotel at reasonable cost
review.reviewText: Stayed three nights.   Over all, a very enjoyable stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable room; equipment/facilities in room worked well; free breakfast above average; free parking for hotel guests; free airport shuttle.
review.negativeRemarks: Indoor dinning area a bit crowded when breakfast was being served.    No sun shade/umbrella for outdoor dining area.
review.locationRemarks: Quiet waterfront location with mile-long walking trail.    Close to airport.
